TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DateType extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class has been deprecated as of Visual Basic 2005.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides methods for manipulating data that potentially represents a `Date` value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static valuetype System.DateTime FromObject(object Value) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. Object to convert to a value.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that corresponds to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static valuetype System.DateTime FromString(string Value) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. String to convert to a value.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that corresponds to the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static DateTime FromString (string Value, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public static valuetype System.DateTime FromString(string Value, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. String to convert to a value.
Required. A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that defines how date values are formatted and displayed, depending on the culture.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that corresponds to the specified string and culture information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
